name: Chicken Crossing (oztech9)
description:
Chicken Crossing! A Two-Player game in which one chicken needs to reach the other side 10 times to win! This game is also MOBILE FRIENDLY!!!

Player 1: W - To Move Up, S - To Move Down

Player 2: Up Arrow - To Move Up, Down Arrow - To Move Down

One of the later game development games developed solo with a series of tutorials given by the programming teacher. This one was very fun to develop!
